title: Senior Python Developer
aboutCompany:
## About TechInnovate Solutions
TechInnovate Solutions is a leading software development firm specializing in scalable web applications and data platforms. We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to our cutting-edge projects.

##
jobDescription: Design and build scalable applications using Python and Django. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs. Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
responsibilities: Develop robust and scalable web applications using Django framework
Integrate with various REST APIs and third-party services
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices
Mentor junior engineers and contribute to team's growth
requirements: 5+ years of experience with Python development
Strong proficiency in Django or Flask frameworks
Experience with cloud platforms like AWS and containerization with Docker
Solid understanding of database systems (SQL/NoSQL)
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Implement robust RESTful APIs
Build interactive user interfaces with React or Angular
Participate in architectural discussions and design decisions
requirements: 3-6 years of experience in Java development
Strong background in Spring Boot and Microservices
Proficiency in JavaScript frameworks like React or Angular
Experience with database technologies (SQL/NoSQL)
Good communication and teamwork abilities
